tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Was pivotal and sidekick to Dr. Abhilash during my Root Canal process. Did help carry out a small gum incision **** **********. Was also responsible for the last final step of cleaning and polishing. 
Its a perfect combination of Dr. Abhilash & Dr. Paridhi that helped me go through the whole process of Root Canal and Crowning effortlessly with minimal amount of pain.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Paridhi is for sure worth recommendable. She explained the cause n cure regarding my issue.  I found her courtious enogh to help me deal with the unbearable pain I was under going. She helped to make my visit to identify worth.
Quite friendly and well versed with her job.
Thank you Dr. Paridhi.....

context: Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Teeth Whitening,
review: Dr Paridhi is a great doctor and I would recommend her to others as well. From starting she made me comfortable and explained the procedure to me with details. The best thing is she will not fool you like others or overcharge you, she is a honest doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We are happy with the treatment and would like to recommend the both Dr pridhi and sneha Lakshmi garu....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is quite good with her work.The session was fair n less painful.Staffs are also very friendly.I found this place cool according to corporate std.
Good cooperative and humble takes extra care .very hygenic while operating and good in behavior.thanks
Dr. Paridhi is a very caring dentist and treats parents very well. She advises well with precautions. Highly recommend!

I am happy with the way my tooth has been taken care. Also, the treatment was made in a proper way. 

Feedback: Charges are at higher side but it is okay when everything is taken care in a proper way.
Doctors very expertise in this treatment. Very nicely did the treatment without any pain.I felt very satisfied on her treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** **** ******** not only treated without causing much pain but also kept a caring and friendly attitude the whole time. Highly recommend her as she also tells the precautions to be taken for maintaining healthy teeth and gums. Thanks alot!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Even after waiting for 1.5 hrs and paying 700 rs for just fixing a wire behind one of my tooth in permanent retainers,  the doctor didn't have the courtesy to devote proper time towards treatment and instructions. As a result I had to visit her again the same day and get those finished again.. Disappointed at the professionalism!

Dr.Pradhi is a gum specialist. She explained the procedure courteously before starting the procedure. I came for toothache. She recommended me for Root Canal Treatment and explained me all the procedure. Would recommend and visit her again.
The staff and doctor were very good and provided their services to the best of my satisfaction. Though there was some delay in the appointments but still overall everything was OK!!
The service was too good and the doctor is very nice. I will surely recommend others . Good work.Thanks
Doctor has patiently examined and explained the causes and areas to take care off. Will come back n suggest to my friends as well
Experience was good. Got suggestions as required and solution made me happy. Also received suggestions regarding root canal treatment.
********* ************ Very good doctor... Iam very much satisfied with the treatment..I definitely recommend this doctor....
The doctor was very sweet and polite! She listened to my problems very carefully and answered all my questions providing all the necessary information.
Good. The only issue was a little bit of time management. I was always on time and the process took time to start off. Otherwise, great doctors, clinic. :)

A long time problem of gum bleeding has been addressed.
Doctor has taken lot of time and patience in answering all the queries that I had asked
